0.1.name: wordpress/ngp-donations
0.1.description:
This plugin helps you integrate NGP (NGP VAN) donation forms with your site. You'll need an SSL certificate running on your site if you want to use this.

This plugin is built and maintained by Revolution Messaging, LLC and uses the New Media Campaigns' NGP API class.

Alert!

You should be running your site under an SSL certificate if you utilize this plugin.
